Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was decent produced though.
That being said, as a piece of film history it's mostly important to see because it introduced parody characters for films and showed that any monstery character could be pranked without enough serious power to regain the initiative with regards to acting.
An Academy Award. But deserves no recognition whatsoever
